message: I'm being generous, but I want most of the money.  Take it or leave it!
Let's split it fairly. I'm willing to give you 40%, but I need at least 60% to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  It's getting risky for both of us the longer we wait.
Let's be reasonable.  We're both losing money the longer we wait.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
